item.description:
Great Chowder Coof Off and staying out in Newport after the festival - anything goes, we will be meeting up with some of our Prov Meetup friends also - a lot of fun - will post more information by mid next week.

I am thinking Meetup around 2 or 3 catch the tail end of the festival then go out in Newport after the Festival.

Please RSVP if you are interested in the event.

Great Chowder Cook Off

Saturday, June 4, 12pm – 6pm

The legendary international chowder championship enters its 30th year in 2011, and the competition is thicker than ever! Enjoy all-you-can-eat samples of various traditional and exotic chowders from across the country and beyond, and vote for the best in three categories: Clam, Seafood and Creative. The power is in your spoon to crown the new titans of chowder! Three world champions return this year to defend their title: Tony’s Cedar Key Clam Chowder (Cedar Key, FL), Michael’s Seafood (Carolina Beach, NC) and The Boat House (Tiverton, RI). With 3 stages of live island-vibe entertainment, kids’ activities and plenty of new surprises to commemorate our 30th year (like our Clamcake Eating Challenge!), we’re cooking up something sensational this summer!

Admission: $25 / $20 Advance*

http://newportwaterfrontevents.com/ - buy tickets today -come and go from 11-6 all you want.
item.how_to_find_us: Mike and Lonnie are meeting guests at 2:45 on the steps of the Post Office on the corner of Thames and Memorial across from the chowder fest (to avoid crowds and you can sit on the steps)...if lost text or call Lonnie's cell 401-829-8516..
item.name: Newport Chowder Festival / stroll around Newport for some food/drinks..
